---
title: 'Reproducible example for the paper "covSTATIS: a multi-table technique for network neuroscience"'
---

This website provides the tutorial with reproducible example for our manuscript "covSTATIS: a multi-table technique for network neuroscience". 

In this repo, you'll find data ([`/Data`](https://github.com/giuliabaracc/covSTATIS_netneuro/tree/main/Data)) and code ([`/pages/tutorial.qmd`](https://github.com/giuliabaracc/covSTATIS_netneuro/tree/main/pages/tutorial.qmd)) we used to create our covSTATIS tutorial. All info on how to run the tutorial yourself is in the .qmd file (or as .rmd file) :)

Happy covSTATISing :)
PS If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out!
